item.title: Virtual Environments
item.description: One thing that I’ve found in my transition into Data Science is that no matter how many classes and bootcamps and projects you do, not many resources (that I’ve found so far) really dive into virtual environments and how to incorporate them into your data science workflow. Either there is no mention of them and thus are either deemed unnecessary, favouring diving into the “meat” of the project or task at hand, or are expected prior knowledge.
